      • connect

        private boolean connect(java.lang.String ipAddress,
                        int port,
                        java.lang.String password)
                 throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Connects to a server
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - the ip address of the server
        port - the port the server listens on
        password - the password for the connection
        Returns:
        true if the connection was a success and false if the connection failed
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - the password is not valid

        Parameters:

        msg - The message sent.
